attributes.action: reduce british taxation by 50% by cutting the civil service by 50%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: everybody knows there are too many civil servants with jobs that overlap are generally just away of keeping the unemployment figures up. So lets get rid of these people who have pointless jobs and cost the country of tax payers an absolute fortune

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
